resp = client.delete_by_query(
    index="my-index-000001",
    slice={
        "id": 0,
        "max": 2
    },
    query={
        "range": {
            "http.response.bytes": {
                "lt": 2000000
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

        "id": 1,
        "max": 2
    },
    query={
